name: Bounty Temple
description: Bounty Temple is the 1st P2E-Evolution GameFi project by Orasis Studio which plans to launch 100 P2EE games with the same governance token, $TYT that prevents downtime caused by future bearish market trends. Backed by ATF Capital and Major Market Maker, Bounty Temple will be focused to solve some existing issue in the GameFi industry and providing some ground breaking solutions to not just the gameplays but also the ecosystems, assets & incentive and also a brand new onboarding & growth journey to all users! Bounty Temple is not any usual GameFi project, we're the revolutionary GameFi 2.0 project! By have a low circulation vs the high demand, we create a scenario where the $TYT value can soar up to $40, a whole 80x of increase during the first unlock! In today’s era, if you want to achieve a major breakthrough, it’s impertinent to invest into a revolutionary project like Bounty Temple.
